name: Strongloop Stack on a Single VM on IBM Cloud
description: Strongloop - An Easy starting point for full stack JavaScript web development.

metadata.displayName: Strongloop Stack on a Single VM
metadata.longDescription: Deploys a Strongloop/Loopback framework and recommended software (Node.js, Angular.js, MongoDB) in Bluemix. This deployment also deploys a simple sample application to validate the deployment is operational.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: IBM Cloud: 1 virtual machine: MongoDB, Strongloop, Node.js, and Angular.js

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description:
1. MongoDB: a NoSQL database
  2. Sliongloop: a complete solution that addresses all aspects of the API lifecycle, for both on-premises and cloud environments
  3. Node.js: an execution environment for event-driven server-side and networking applications
  4. Angular.js: a JavaScript MVC framework that runs in browser JavaScript engines

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• IBM Cloud:
    • Flavor: Cores = 2, Memory = 4GB, Storage = 25GB SAN
    • Network: Private IP - Computed, Public IP - Computed
    • Firewall: Not enabled

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  2. Deployment takes approximately 10 minutes to complete.
  3. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  4. The sample application in this deployment is partially from the open source project https://github.com/strongloop/loopback-example-angular and more details of software can be found in https://www.mongodb.com/, https://strongloop.com/, https://nodejs.org/en/, and https://angularjs.org/.
